name: Icon Residences By Sunnyside Hotel and Resorts
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 12 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring kitchens with full-sized refrigerators/freezers and stovetops. Rooms have private balconies or patios. Flat-screen televisions with cable programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include microwaves and coffee/tea makers, and housekeeping is provided on request. Amenities Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, which include 2 outdoor swimming pools, a health club, and a sauna. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include express check-out, multilingual staff, and laundry facilities. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite. Property Location A stay at Icon Residences By Sunnyside Hotel and Resorts places you in the heart of Miami, within a 5-minute drive of Bayside Marketplace and Miami-Dade Arena. This 4-star aparthotel is 0.9 mi (1.5 km) from Brickell City Centre and 2.7 mi (4.3 km) from PortMiami. Dining Grab a bite to eat at one of the aparthotel's many dining establishments, which include 5 restaurants and a coffee shop/cafe. Relax with a refreshing drink from the bar/lounge or one of the 2 poolside bars. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: Deposit: USD 250.00 per accommodation, per stay We have included all charges provided to us by the property. Optional Charges Covered self parking fee: USD 30 per day (in/out privileges) Late check-in fee for check-in between 10:00 PM and 1:30 AM A late check-out fee will be charged Housekeeping is available for an additional fee The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. Check-In Checkin starts at 4:00 PM Checkin end at 10:00 PM The minimum age of Checkin 18 Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy Government-issued photo identification and a credit card may be required at check-in for incidental charges Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation Tax ID - 453982217 This property accepts credit cards, debit cards, and cash Long-term renters welcome Noise-free guestrooms cannot be guaranteed Be prepared: check the latest COVID-19 travel requirements and measures in place for this destination before you travel. Please note that cultural norms and guest policies may differ by country and by property; the policies listed are provided by the property There is no front desk at this property. If you are planning to arrive after 9:00 AM please contact the property in advance using the information on the booking confirmation. Guests will receive an email 72 hours before arrival with check-in instructions. The host will greet guests on arrival. For more details, please contact the property using the information on the booking confirmation. The name on the credit card and ID must match the name of the guest on the reservation. Any other arrangements must be coordinated with the property prior to arrival. Check-Out Checkout is done at 11:00 AM Pets Pets not allowed Service animals are allowed Service animals are exempt from fees/restrictions General instructions No rollaway/extra beds available Noise-free rooms not guaranteed Essential workers only - NO Property uses a professional cleaning service Property is cleaned with disinfectant Social distancing measures are in place Property confirms they are implementing enhanced cleaning measures Bed sheets and towels are washed at a temperature of at least 60°C/140°F Commonly-touched surfaces are cleaned with disinfectant Property confirms they are implementing guest safety measures Contactless check-out is available Professional property host/manager Property does not offer onsite COVID-19 testingViajes Exito Hotels

name: Acqualina Resort & Residences On The Beach
address: 17875 Collins Avenue, Sunny Isles Beach, FL 33160
description: Reminiscent of a Mediterranean villa, Acqualina invites you to step into a world of luxury with unprecedented accommodations and service, world-class dining destinations with four restaurants including the new Avra Miami and Il Mulino New York, three oceanfront swimming pools, Acqualina Spa, spacious meeting rooms, and AcquaMarine, an innovative marine biology-based children's program. Recent introductions to the resort include a new Adult Pool experience and a Floridian-meets-Mediterranean menu at the beachside Costa Grill. The luxury seaside haven is located on 4.5 beachfront acres in Miami’s Sunny Isles Beach, and conveniently located between Miami International Airport and Fort Lauderdale Airport. Designed to offer a sense of modern luxury with classic furnishings and finishes, the richly appointed accommodations are the hallmark of the guest experience at Acqualina. Offerings include 54 guest rooms and 44 suites, all offering expansive floor plans and breathtaking views from private balconies. One, Two and Three Bedroom Oceanfront Suites are available. Only 10 minute drive from the Acqualina Resort are the luxury shops and restaurants of Bal Harbor. The vibrant South Beach area as well as the legendary Art Deco district is also within driving distance. A family owned and operated property, Acqualina is a recipient of the coveted Forbes Travel Guide Five-Star Award for both the hotel and spa, as well as the AAA Five Diamond Award. Acqualina is also named the #1 Best Resort in the U.S. and the #1 Best Hotel in the U.S. by U.S. News & World Report.USA Today named Acqualina Best Destination Resort in the U.S.

name: The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort
description: The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort welcomes you to savor an exceptional experience at our exquisitely appointed retreat in Miami Beach, FL. Rising 27 stories over fashionable Collins Ave and a brilliant white-sand beach, our luxury hotel resides at the intersection of art, fashion and design. Prestigious Forbes Five-Star and AAA Five-Diamond accolades set the stage for unparalleled service and amenities. Step into spacious guest rooms and suites with direct ocean views from expansive private balconies. Then, luxuriate in superb resort amenities including 14,000 square feet of indulgence at The Spa at St. Regis, Oceanfront Day Villas and gourmet dining options. An oasis of pampering and privilege at the northern tip of Miami Beach, FL, Bal Harbour is one of the most distinguished addresses in South Florida, and our hotel has long been a favorite destination for jet-setting travelers worldwide.Marriott

name: The Alexander Ocean Front Resort
description: The Alexander Hotel is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Miami Beach (FL). The property has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at The Alexander Hotel. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as air conditioning, heating, wake-up service, desk, balcony/terrace. The property offers various recreational opportunities. No matter what your reasons are for visiting Miami Beach (FL), The Alexander Hotel will make you feel instantly at home.priceline.com

name: The Ritz-Carlton Key Biscayne Miami
address: 455 Grand Bay Drive, Key Biscayne, FL 33149
description: Escape to a luxury Miami Beach resort that exudes the classic charm of South Florida. Located on an exclusive five-mile-long barrier island, The Ritz-Carlton Key Biscayne, Miami is just minutes from dynamic downtown, yet provides an atmosphere of sequestered serenity. With elegant architecture inspired by West Indies Colonial design, The Ritz-Carlton Key Biscayne, Miami is one of the finest beach hotels Miami, Florida has to offer.Marriott
